products.title: Bella Blackout Oyster Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Bella Blackout Oyster Electric Roller Blind in Cream. Made to measure from £138.17 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Electric Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Bella is a beautiful range of blinds with a good selection of colours. The blackout feature makes it perfect for those who want to create darkness in the room at any time. 
 The Bella Blackout Oyster roller blind in a lovely white colour will suit almost any room. 
   
 
 Product ID: DB-ERBX1836 Fabric Colour: Oyster Material: 100% Polyester Lining: Colour Match Backing - See Sample Headrail: Durable Aluminium Roller Tube Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top, Face or Side Fix     Control Type: Electric Control Battery Powered Energy Saving Rating: ER3 - Highest Energy Saving Value - UV Protection and Effective Thermal Retention Blackout: Yes

products.title: Bella Blackout Dove Grey Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Bella Blackout Dove Grey Electric Roller Blind in Grey. Made to measure from £140.59 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Electric Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our best-selling Bella Blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and inside your home! 
 
This soft Dove Grey electric roller blind is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure electric roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.  Our electric rollers are great for privacy and light control, and due to their chain-free design, are inherently child-safe! 
 
At Swift Direct Blinds, we take quality seriously.  Not only are we situated in the heart of the Yorkshire textile industry, but our own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years experience making blinds and curtains for home up and down the country.  This light grey electric roller blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by our blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service.
 
 Product ID: DB-ERBX2121 Fabric Colour: Dove Grey Material: 100% Polyester Lining: Colour Match Backing - See Sample Headrail: Durable White Headrail with Top or Face Fix Brackets.     Control Type: Electric Control Battery Powered Energy Saving Rating: ER3 - Highest Energy Saving Value - UV Protection and Effective Thermal Retention Blackout: Yes
